name: get_taxi_fares
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool taxi_fare_calculator.
Tool description: How much does a taxi cost? Estimate your taxicab fare & rates. Get your taxi fare now and compare taxi prices. Taxi Fare Calculator provides taxi & cab fares for any trip in any city. The API provides you with a price for the best possible route for your cab ride.
API description: Calculate taxi fares between two geographical points using the RapidAPI taxi fare calculator.
